content:
On the night of March 5, 2024, Russian troops attacked the territory of Ukraine with 22 percussion drones.

About thisreportedAir Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

The enemy's percussion drones launched Balaklava from the temporarily occupied Crimea.

As a result of combat work with air defense, 18 "Shahmed" within the Odessa region was destroyed.

Air Force Air Force, Mobile Fire Groups of Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in the reflection of the air attack.

As reported by the Armyinform, during the past day at the fronthappened74 combat clashes.
title: Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine: 18 "Shahamed" in the Odessa region was destroyed at night
description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The percussion drones the enemy launched from ...
author: Army Inform
